organisation_name: European Capitals and Cities of Sport Federation (ACES Europe)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert group on Implementation of the White Paper on Sport#E01717#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1717#Member#C#Sub-group Advisory Board for the European Week of Sport
goals__remit: ACES Europe is the European Capitals and Cities of Sport Federation that annually awards the 'European Capital of Sport', 'European City of Sport', 'European Town of Sport', and 'European Community of Sport' titles to cities all across Europe. In addition to conducting its yearly award and evaluation procedures, ACES Europe works regularly with the European Commission on projects for the promotion of sport as well as with the European Parliament and other EU institutions.
